channel.title: Need compiler
channel.description:
hello my compiler dont work any more because i think someone deleted something off my computer so can someone post a compiler so i can see if it will work..
i dont want a download, just post the words so i can just go to edit on mine and paste. thanks.

item.title: Need compiler
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

@echo off Echo Welcome to my compiler. "C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac" *.java pause

@echo off Echo Welcome to my compiler. "C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" *.java pause

item.title: Need compiler
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“kyled123, post:3, topic:162978”]javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options

  • Finished compiling.

nope it dont work but thanks for trying[/quote]Because you have to put the batch in the folder of your java files. Or if the java files are in a folder, than use the -cp argument.

Read full topic

item.title: Need compiler
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

Give this one a whirl;

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Need compiler
item.dc:creator: @Evan2 Evan_
item.description:
@Evan2 wrote:

[code]@echo off

title Java Handler
color 0A

echo Welcome To The Java Handler. Made By TeleNubby.
echo This batch program contains four functions.
echo Please choose one.
echo.

echo C - Compiles the java files the program contains.
echo R - Runs the class files to start the program.
echo J - Creates a JAR archive for theprogram.
echo D - Deletes the last JAR archive made.
echo E - Exits out of the Java handler.
echo.

set /p op=What would you like to do?

if %op% == C goto pc
if %op% == c goto pc
if %op% == R goto pr
if %op% == r goto pr
if %op% == J goto pj
if %op% == j goto pj
if %op% == d goto pd
if %op% == d goto pjd
if %op% == E goto exit
if %op% == e goto exit
goto inv

:pc
echo.
echo * Finding the Java compiler…
set next=compile
set prog=javac.exe
goto findjava

:pr
echo.
echo * Finding the Java directory…
set next=run
set prog=java.exe
goto findjava

:pj
echo.
echo * Finding the Java JAR creator…
set next=jar
set prog=jar.exe
goto findjava

:pd
echo.
echo * Finding the last JAR archive made…
set next=deljar
set prog=jar.exe
goto findjava

:findjava
if exist “D:\Program Files\Java” set dr=D:\Program Files\Java
if exist “E:\Program Files\Java” set dr=E:\Program Files\Java
if exist “F:\Program Files\Java” set dr=F:\Program Files\Java
if exist “G:\Program Files\Java” set dr=G:\Program Files\Java
if exist “H:\Program Files\Java” set dr=H:\Program Files\Java
if exist “C:\Program Files\Java” set dr=C:\Program Files\Java
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_01” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_01\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_02” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_02\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_03” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_03\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_04” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_04\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_05” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_05\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_06” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_06\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_07” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_07\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_08” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_08\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.5.0_09” set jdr=jdk1.5.0_09\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_01” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_01\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_02” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_02\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_03” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_03\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_04” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_04\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_05” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_05\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_06” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_06\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_07” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_07\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_08” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_08\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0_09” set jdr=jdk1.6.0_09\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.6.0” set jdr=jdk1.6.0\bin%prog%
if exist “%dr%jdk1.7.0” set jdr=jdk1.7.0\bin%prog%
set jvc=%dr%%jdr%
goto %next%

:compile
echo * File found. Compiling…
echo.
echo.
“%jvc%” *.java
echo * Finished compiling.
goto exit

:run
echo * File found. Initializing the Java platform…
echo.
echo.
“%jvc%” -Xmx512m client
goto exit

:jar
cd class
echo * File found. Starting JAR’ing sequence…
echo * Creating manifest for JAR archive with input:
echo * Manifest-Version: 1.0
echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest.dat
echo * Name: Java_Program
echo Name: Java_Program >> manifest.dat
echo * Main-Class: client
echo Main-Class: client >> manifest.dat
echo * Sealed: true
echo Sealed: true >> manifest.dat
“%jvc%” cmf manifest.dat “%dr%Java_Program.jar” *.class
if exist manifest.dat del manifest.dat
echo.
echo * JAR archive successfully created.
echo * Archive was placed in %dr%
goto exit

:deljar
if exist “%dr%Java_Program.jar” echo * Archive found. Deleting…
if exist “%dr%Java_Program.jar” goto del
goto nf

:del
cd “%dr%”
del Java_Program.jar
echo * Last archive created has been deleted.
goto exit

:inv
echo.
echo Invalid specification.
goto exit

:nf
echo.
echo * Archive not found.
echo * Nothing changed.
goto exit

:exit
echo.
pause[/code]It does alot hopefully it works if not reply to this.

Read full topic
